title: ThruNite TC20 V2 Handheld Flashlight High 4068 Lumen, USB C Rechargeable Waterproof LED Flashlight, 299 Meters Throw Bright Outdoor Light - Black CW
features: Please CHARGE the flashlight before use, and pls SCREW DOWN the light head and tail cap first before charging.

SUPER BRIGHT - ThruNite TC20 V2 utilizes CREE XHP70 2nd generation LED, delivering an output ranges from 0.3 to 4068 lumens, up to 299 meters/ 326 yards of beam visibility. Light your road up in the dark.

USB C RECHARGEABLEÂ - It comes built-in USB-C 2A charging port and cable and no extra new battery will be needed. With battery indicator on the body, it will reminder you to charge when battery voltage is low.
LONG RUNTIME - Powered by an included high capacity battery, TC20 V2 provides more power, after fully charged, it could run for incredibly 71 days in firefly mode, perfect gear for outdoor adventure.

VERSATILE USAGE - As a bright, durable, shockproof, and weather-resistant flashlight with 6 brightness modes, TC20 V2 used for illumination, self-defense, emergency situations, law enforcement, and security affair.
WHAT YOU WILL GET - ThruNite TC20 V2 cool white flashlight*1, Holster*1, Spare O-rings *2, Lanyard *1, THRUNITE Battery *1, USB-C Charging Cord *1, Spare USB Rubber Cover *1, Spare Side Switch Cap *1
description: LED: CREE XHP 70 2nd gen. with a lifespan of 20+ years of run time.  Runs on: 1 x ThruNite battery.  Reflector: Orange peel reflector. Working Voltage: 2.75 - 4.2 V.

Turbo (4068~1722 lumens; 220 secs+90 mins) High (1853 lumen; 122 mins) Medium (320 lumen; 9 hrs) Low (35 lumen; 77 hrs) Firefly (0.3 lumen; 71 days) Strobe (1475 lumen; 211 mins) Peak Beam Intensity: 22400 cd.  Max beam distance: 299 meters.  Impact resistant: 1.5 meters.  Waterproof to IPX-8 Standard (2 meters).  Weight: 143g without battery.  Dimensions: 119mm in length x 42mm in head diameter x 33.5mm in tailcap diameter Accessories: Holster x1, Spare O-rings x2, Lanyard x1, ThruNite Battery x1, USB C Charging Cord x1, Spare USB Rubber Cover x1, Spare Side Switch Cap x1
Press the side switch to turn the light on/off.

When the light is on, long-press the side switch to cycle through low, medium and high. Shortcut to firefly: When the light is off, long-press the side switch to get firefly mode. Double click to turn to turbo from any mode. Another double click to get strobe.
The light will turn on in the last mode accessed, except for firefly, turbo, and strobe.

Max 2A USB-C charging. During charging, the indicator is RED. After being fully charged, the indicator will be BLUE. When indicator flashes purple, it means abnormal charging. Only firefly, low and medium modes are available while charging.
